column3: Can AI wipe out humanity by 2030?

Elon Musk
Early investor at OpenAI
Cofounder of xAI, which built Grok
Net worth > $400B

Ilya Sutskever
Cofounder and chief scientist of OpenAI, which built ChatGPT
OpenAI founded to compete with Deepmind
Co-inventor of AlexNet along with Geoffrey Hinton
Net worth unknown
Now resigned from OpenAI. Cofounder of Safe Superintelligence Inc.
Sam Altman\nCofounder of OpenAI, Worlds largest AGI company\nNet worth unknown

Dario Amodei
Cofounder of Anthropic, which built Claude
Founded by ex-OpenAI employees to compete with OpenAI
Net worth > $1B

Shane Legg
Cofounder of Deepmind, Worlds first AGI company
Net worth > $500M
PhD under Marcus Hutter

Demis Hassabis
Cofounder of Deepmind, Worlds first major AGI lab
Noble Prize winner, PhD
Net worth >$500M
Geoffrey Hinton\nNoble Prize winner, Godfather of AI\nInvented AlexNet
Yoshua Bengio\nTuring award winner, Godfather of AI\nWorlds most cited AI researcher
Eliezer Yudkowsky\nDecision theorist\nHas been warning about AI-driven extinction for over 20 years

Marcus Hutter
Inventor of AIXI
Shane Leggs PhD Advisor
Senior researcher, Deepmind
